document.discussion_title: eBay Inc (EBAY) Receives “Hold” Rating from Cantor Fitzgerald
document.topic_text: Tweet eBay Inc (NASDAQ:EBAY) ‘s stock had its “hold” rating reiterated by stock analysts at Cantor Fitzgerald in a research report issued to clients and investors on Monday, MarketBeat.Com reports. In other news, Director Robert Holmes Swan sold 50,000 shares of the company’s stock in a transaction on Monday, February 1st. The stock was sold at an average price of $23.74, for a total transaction of $1,187,000.00. Following the transaction, the director now directly owns 474,469 shares of the company’s stock, valued at $11,263,894.06. The sale was disclosed in a filing with the SEC, which is available at the SEC website . Also, Director Thomas J. Tierney sold 7,971 shares of the company’s stock in a transaction on Monday, February 22nd. The shares were sold at an average price of $24.00, for a total value of $191,304.00. Following the transaction, the director now directly owns 23,448 shares in the company, valued at $562,752. The disclosure for this sale can be found here . Other hedge funds have recently bought and sold shares of the company. Destination Wealth Management purchased a new stake in eBay during the fourth quarter worth approximately $262,000. B.S. Pension Fund Trustee Ltd acting for the British Steel Pension Fund bought a new stake in shares of eBay during the fourth quarter worth approximately $352,000. Acadian Asset Management boosted its stake in shares of eBay by 15.8% in the fourth quarter. Acadian Asset Management now owns 13,213 shares of the e-commerce company’s stock worth $363,000 after buying an additional 1,800 shares during the last quarter. Peddock Capital Advisors LLC boosted its stake in shares of eBay by 44.0% in the first quarter. Peddock Capital Advisors LLC now owns 14,968 shares of the e-commerce company’s stock worth $357,000 after buying an additional 4,572 shares during the last quarter. Finally, Capital Investment Advisors boosted its stake in shares of eBay by 2.1% in the fourth quarter. Capital Investment Advisors now owns 24,003 shares of the e-commerce company’s stock worth $401,000 after buying an additional 501 shares during the last quarter. Shares of eBay ( NASDAQ:EBAY ) traded down 0.37% during mid-day trading on Monday, reaching $24.31. 10,291,615 shares of the company’s stock traded hands. The company has a market cap of $28.65 billion and a price-to-earnings ratio of 17.14. eBay has a 12 month low of $21.52 and a 12 month high of $29.83. The company has a 50 day moving average of $24.28 and a 200 day moving average of $25.86. A number of other analysts have also recently commented on EBAY. Zacks Investment Research upgraded eBay from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating and set a $29.00 price objective for the company in a research report on Wednesday, January 13th. Susquehanna restated a “buy” rating on shares of eBay in a research report on Saturday, January 16th. Benchmark Co. dropped their price objective on eBay from $29.00 to $28.00 and set a “buy” rating for the company in a research note on Thursday, January 28th. Monness Crespi & Hardt dropped their price objective on eBay from $31.00 to $29.00 and set a “buy” rating for the company in a research note on Thursday, January 28th. Finally, Robert W. Baird reaffirmed a “buy” rating and issued a $33.00 price objective on shares of eBay in a research note on Monday, January 4th. Three research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, nineteen have given a hold rating, twenty have given a buy rating and one has assigned a strong buy rating to the stock. eBay presently has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of $40.25. eBay Inc( NASDAQ:EBAY ) is a global technology company. The Company has created an open source platform that provides software developers and merchants access to its applications programming interfaces (APIs) to develop software and solutions for commerce. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/04/25/ebay-inc-ebay-receives-hold-rating-from-cantor-fitzgerald/ eBay Inc eBay Inc
